content: Yo, peeps! Who's on the React bug hunt? 🐞
Ngl, not me. Nested JSONs acting sus
Hey, what's up with the React bug? Mind fillin' me in?
React bug in 'GET /api/data' endpoint. Our code's playin' hide and seek with data
Bubbl3Waffl3, you in? I'm divin' into the code, might take a sec
Totally! Lemme know if you need an extra set of eyes or hands
Nice, Bubbl3Waffl3! Let's crush this bug together
Nested madness. I'm fixing it up
Hyped for the fix! We good for review and testing after, right?
Bubbl3Waffl3, you missed the bug hunt. Found a sneaky nested bug, but BugHunter's on it. It's gonna be lit after the fix!
Dang, sounds wild! Count me in for the post-fix celebration. Let's pop virtual confetti or something.
Absolutely! We'll throw a code confetti party. 🎉👾
Update: Bug squashed! Pushing the fix now. Get ready for the confetti rain!
Woot woot! Get ready, team. Code confetti in 3... 2... 1...
Cheers to bug-free code and code confetti! 🥂🎉
